wargame

Class GameContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • wargame.GameContext

  • public class GameContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the context in which the game is running, like the game state, its configuration, the loaded sprites... All data that are beside the game itself.
    Author:
    Balthazar Pavot
